name: .ZDOC File Extension
summary: Learn about .ZDOC files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: To open the Zoho Writer document to which a ZDOC file points, double-click the ZDOC file from within Zoho WorkDrive Sync or WorkDrive TrueSync. If the shortcut the ZDOC file contains is valid, the associated document will open in Zoho Writer.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
